text:
Life at Maratha Mandal Engineering College is active and student-focused. The college encourages a balance of academics and extracurriculars.
Highlights:
• Student clubs and technical teams.
• Annual events and hackathons.
• Sports and cultural fests.
• Supportive faculty and mentors.
• Green, peaceful campus environment promoting creativity and innovation.

Maratha Mandal Engineering College (MMEC), established in 1997, is AICTE-approved and affiliated to VTU, Belagavi. Located at R.S. No. 104, Halbhavi Village, New Vantmuri Post, Via-Kakati, Belagavi – 591113, Karnataka. Contact: +91 9353364643, info@mmec.edu.in. Website: www.mmec.edu.in.
Tell me about the courses offered

MMEC offers these major streams:
    - Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
    - Robotics & Artificial Intelligence (R&AI)
    - Mechanical Engineering
    - Electronics & Communication Engineering (ECE)
